snippet: Yukio Edano, the minister for economy, trade and industry, cast further doubt on whether the resource-poor nation will follow through on a contentious plan to phase out nuclear power.
lead_paragraph: Yukio Edano, the minister for economy, trade and industry, cast further doubt on whether the resource-poor nation will follow through on a contentious plan to phase out nuclear power.

headline.seo: Japan Won’t Stop Work on Reactors, Official Says
headline.main: Japan Won’t Stop Work on Reactors, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Japan Won’t Stop Work on Reactors, Official Says
